Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Renee
Reviews.Content: I love the front facing screen!! It makes it super easy to take pictures of yourself, and it also lets your subjects know how their pictures will turn out. The camera is really easy to use, and I love all the settings

Reviews.Title: samsung PL170
Reviews.Author: youssef
Reviews.Content: the item was very nice well packed contained all the presented items and arrived one day before schedule i am satisfied with its performance and happy i got it

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Irenio Vieras
Reviews.Content: Excellent. Just as expected. Good resolution, screen on both sides, all very well. The video recording is good but not the best.

Reviews.Title: It is the best camera on the market!
Reviews.Author: JOSUE "Dave"
Reviews.Content: It is the best camera on the market, the best price and the best accedsorios. The dual screen is great!

Reviews.Title: Adorable starter camera
Reviews.Author: Jezzabelle
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because of the high pixel number. Excellent price for this camera and kit. I will use it for advertising my business. I have the iPhone 4s, which is hard to beat. But this camera is very sharp and I use the camera connection kit to load pics to my iPad HD. I am an amateur photographer, so this does the work for me. This camera was exactly what I was looking for. Very happy. Oh yeah, the seller is excellent also.

Reviews.Title: Samsung PL170 Is the prefect camera
Reviews.Author: FAX Master
Reviews.Content: I love this little hand size camera. It has clear and easy to use instruction. The battery lasts longer then other digital cameras I bought but still not the perfect battery.  The camera itself, is a great little product to buy and use.

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung PL170 DualView 16 Megapixel Black Digital Camera, Dual LCDs, 5x Wide-Angle Zoom Lens, HD Video, Dual Image Stabilization. Bundle Includes 8 GB Memory Card, Card Reader, Deluxe Carrying Case, Mini Tripod, and 3Pcs. Lens Cleaning Kit.
